programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2831
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1027
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep109
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep257258
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep483
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home (M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Every one of them showed up in this house with some sort of lacking until they've met Mommy Hsiao-Li. Although they are not biologicap related, they Stay with each other like a real family.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the public housing estate where he grew up, not to visit his aging father, but to seek refuge after his business has failed. When his family of five squeeze into the small estate unit, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, hed still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tais best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion. Award winning actor Ku Feng is his equal, playing an especially homicidal robber-chief who thinks nothing of throwing all his men at their relentless pursuer. Lu Tsun and Huang Pei-chi choreograph the many battles featuring such action stalwarts as Pai Piao and Ai Fei.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.desc: An Adventure In The Jungle - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found in the jungle of district 9. A screaming battle begins. The Bobobobobone falls into a lake full of piranhas.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep36
programme.desc: A Day In The Life Of Cancan - CanCan is a luxurious dog with a luxurious life owned by a rich family. She could get whatever she asked for except for the Bobobobobone.

programme.desc: Shiro Becomes A Ninja - Shiro must sneak into a castle in Kasukabe Ninja Town where a secret book in the shape of a bone is hidden in, and it may be the Bobobobobone.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep38
programme.desc: The Secret Of The Super Hero Badge - Suddenly, Deca is interested in how Shiros Super Dash works. Deca steals the badge while Shiro is away and accidentally becomes tiny as an ant.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep39
programme.desc: An Ant's Life - The Bobobobobone is in an ants nest and Shiro heads over to investigate. Deca gets small with the SuperBeam and sneaks inside.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Sunday Golf - The Bobobobobone is the golf ball at a Golf Course in district 40. Shiro heads over but spots Shin chain's dad playing business golf

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep41
programme.desc: A Sleepless Night - The pistol on a flower in the mountains is the Bobobobobone. Deca and Shiro must wake up all night as it only blossoms for a second.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep42
programme.desc: The Super Hero Catches A Cold - Deca hears information about the Bobobobobone and races to its location but finds Shiro ill with a cold. Will Deca finally get the Bobobobobone?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Run, Run Away, And Run After - From one place to the other, Shiro and Deca chase after each other nonstop! CanCan appears, and they become even more excited!

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Mysterious Bobobobobone - A book in the library might be the Bobobobobone. While Deca and Shiro search, suddenly a strange dog speaks to them from the bookshelves.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 21
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip to Canyon Country to bid on huge trailers.A mysterious concrete block and a trailer full of hay mean big opportunities and lead to unusual alliances within the group.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 22
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Person Of Interest S4 3
programme.desc: Fusco becomes a Ladies Man and a target when Finch asks him to stay close to a professional wingman whose number has come up.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 12
programme.desc: The CBI team investigates the death of a geologist -- a murder, which Lisbon is convinced is the key to bringing down multimillionaire Volker.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 01
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Michael poses as a hipster at a farmers market and makes an endless supply of juice. Then things become blurry at the eye doctor, and later, shape shifting aliens send Michael's co-worker into a frenzy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 14
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys advertise incompetence to a group of agency executives, are forced into dirty deeds as custodians in a mall food court, and tempt their fates by returning to the wheel of doom!

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 2
programme.desc: Thonys in-laws come to Las Vegas. Meanwhile, she must help Arman by meeting with Robert Kamdar, Nadias gregarious and charming ex-lover.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 3
programme.desc: Thony must team up with Arman and Nadia in a new money-making venture to save Lucas life. Meanwhile, Fiona works to keep Chris out of trouble when the threat of evidence arises.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 4
programme.desc: After Fiona puts herself in a dangerous situation, Thony resorts to calling Arman for help. Garrett works to get put back on the Cortez case.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 5
programme.desc: Arman and Nadia realize Thonys ethical methods arent making them enough money. Fiona takes the lead on starting her and Thonys new cleaning business.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 6
programme.desc: An unexpected trio emerges in the mission to take down Corts, as Arman and Nadias relationship hits a breaking point. Meanwhile, Fiona attempts to keep her family safe as Chris continues to grieve.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 10
programme.desc: Michael befuddles a hardware store patron with a collapsible spray paint can, and cuts a costume shop employee down to size when he shrinks into a leprechaun outfit. Later, a museum employee makes the discovery of a lifetime when a preserved egg hatches a baby dinosaur.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 11
programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 12
programme.desc: Michael hits the jackpot at a convenience store and amazes a mother when he demonstrates her child's genius abilities at a toy store. Later, MIchael astonishes his Japanese restaurant co-worker with a set-up that really takes the cake.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 13
programme.desc: Michael leaves a co-worker out to dry at the garden center with a technologically confounding hose that wirelessly transmits water. Later, at the dog groomers, Michael's puppy takes to the catwalk after dressing himself in the most fashionable canine attire.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 10
programme.desc: Sheldon takes on his greatest challenge when he attempts to help Penny understand physics, and Wolowitz becomes jealous when Leonard starts hanging out with his new girlfriend.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 11
programme.desc: A visit from Leonard's mother (guest star CHRISTINE BARANSKI) delights Sheldon and horrifies Leonard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 12
programme.desc: While Sheldon and Koothrappali attend a university mixer, Leonard is upset to discover that Penny believes in psychics. DANICA McKELLAR stars as the object of Raj's attraction.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 13
programme.desc: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to their friends to create a state-of-the-art security system -- and Sheldon struggles to cope.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 14
programme.desc: Sheldon's case of "physicist's block" while searching for the answer to a physics problem leads him to work at the Cheesecake Factory with Penny.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 10
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys endure a shakedown in a discount store, put their fate in the hands of the "Wheel of Doom," and try to hack it as Hibachi chefs without going up in flames.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 11
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. It's an eye for an eye when the guys face off as optometrists, they break each others' banks giving bad financial advice, and push outrageous political platforms ina fruitless hunt for votes.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 12
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys lose their rhythm while teaching dance class, try to hock tickets to fantastical Broadway plays, and demand a rematch in their sudden death debates.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 13
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys host a taste test with embarrassing survey questions, haggle over priceless pieces of junk at a flea market, and tank as attendants at a gas station.

programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep6
programme.desc: City - Its Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifaxs raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Belize - More than 200 caves play host to an unmatched array of marine life and coral formations in this underwater kingdom 40 kilometres from Belize City. It's a deep blue wilderness brimming with rare, exotic fish, eagle rays, sharks, and huge green morays.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Highlands - Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ocean Oddballs - Dive into the lives of the oceans weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fishs eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ireland - Explore an island surrounded by the mighty Atlantic ocean, subjected to pounding waves and driving rain. From the Cliffs of Moher to the Giants Causeway, this land has been shaped and reshaped by the power of water and violent geological forces.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep10
programme.desc: Born to Be Wild - Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the worlds only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Remarkable Reptiles - Africa - a continent teeming with life. While its animal aristocrats are the most familiar, lurking in the shadows is a diversity of reptiles. programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7

programme.desc: Ireland - Explore an island surrounded by the mighty Atlantic ocean, subjected to pounding waves and driving rain. From the Cliffs of Moher to the Giants Causeway, this land has been shaped and reshaped by the power of water and violent geological forces.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blandings can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Anatomy Gone Wild - Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Out of the Darkness - Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Icelands volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sammi, Rose, and Casey - Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Family - Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies and raising them is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of youth and the threats of the wild.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 Ep2

programme.title: Mabel: I Want My MTV
programme.desc: Mabel comes in to MTV HQ to talk about the music videos that have made her into the successful artist she is today! What was the first video she ever saw on MTV and who's her biggest inspiration?

programme.title: MTV Push Presents: Flo
programme.desc: Flo sits down with MTV to chat about life, music and their rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of some of their tracks!

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest Hip-Hop, R&B, K-Pop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2021
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2021!

programme.title: Good 4 U! 20 Heartbreak Anthems
programme.desc: Sometimes love hurts, and music can be a great remedy to a wounded soul! Let out your anger, angst and tears with these tunes that'll prove whatever you're going through, you're not alone.

programme.title: Hot Right Now!
programme.desc: We bring you the very hottest music videos in the world right now!

programme.title: Eat, Sleep, Dance, Repeat!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fable Forest Gold - The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep46
programme.desc: Imposters - Ty has trouble keeping all of the new Trux organized and cooperative, and D-Structs comes up with a plan that throws the crater into even more chaos.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep46
programme.desc: Dial M For Mystery/Turbo Real - Somebody knocks Whiplash unconscious for real at a fake mystery dinner; the crew competes for attention on a reality show, leading to complete chaos.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep46
programme.desc: Walkaboov / Big Boy Boy - Oh wants to get back in touch with his Boov roots/When Oh decides he needs to be more independent, he moves into Elrod's old apartment

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep41
programme.desc: Chalk The Line / Weighting Is The Hardest Part - Eep cheats her way into being considered an adult; Grug learns he's no longer the strongest caveman and turns to a radical method for building brawn

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep42
programme.desc: Wrestlebabia: The Musica / Flowers For Munk - When Sandy can't join animal wrestling she poses as Mandy Monkhuahua; In order to help Munk, Grug sticks super worms up his nose that make him smarter

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep72
programme.desc: Ruff Transition - A baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut forcing her to become a Wingmaiden but when she doesnt have the maternal instincts she must figure out how to protect the baby dragon when the Flyers attack

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.desc: There Will Be Juice - When a crate of PURE ORGANIC IMPOSSIBLY SAFE ORGANIC NUTRIENTS washes onto shore King Julien accidentally overfeeds the crops creating a giant mango that tries to take over the world

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep13
programme.desc: The Black Paladin - Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep14
programme.desc: Across The Universe - Team Voltron is left scattered with Shiro and Keith on a lava planet, Pidge stranded on a garbage nebula, and Coran and Allura trapped in a wormhole

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep14
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle damage the largest birdbath in the world, they set out on a musical adventure to put on a benefit concert and raise the money needed to restore the birdbath.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep41
programme.desc: Return Of The Guapos Part 3 - After the Guapos steal their show, Peabody and Sherman must track down 3 historical bandits running amuck in NYC.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep42
programme.desc: Magic Hiccups / Gaius Maecenas - Sherman accidentally swallows Sweet Tune's magic flute and gets a case of magical hiccups, creating complete chaos on the show.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep11
programme.desc: Two Twigs/Fresh Coat of Pain - The Mighty Ones can't tell the difference between Twig and a random stick bug. / Rocksy sees fresh coat of paint spilled all over and becomes obsessed with trying to freshen up the yard.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep12
programme.desc: A Stinky Situation /Fire-Fly - When Twig gets sprayed by a skunk trying to save his friends, the Mighty Ones agree not to ruin his hero moment by telling him that the stinks. Instead, they try to wash the smell off of him without him knowing. / The Mighty Ones are cold so when they hear about a wonderful creature known as a "fire-fly," they decide it will be the answer to their problems.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces fast food to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep35
programme.desc: Uh-Oh, Canada - The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep13
programme.desc: Photo Day Disaster / The Eightful Eight - When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep17
programme.desc: Simply The Best - Molecom is very grateful to Plugger for rescuing him after yet another of Flash's pranks. But Plugger is soon frustrated by Molecom's attempts to help Meanwhile, Roary is trying hard to beat his best lap time.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of The Mystery Artist - There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep18
programme.desc: Cici Wins The Day - Cici is fed up with never winning and decides not to take part in the race that day. Can Roary persuade her to change her mind?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep47
programme.desc: Junktools - When the crew is forced to spend a night in the desert to avoid a sandstorm, they wake up the next day without their most important parts.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep47
programme.desc: Best Frenemies/The Jamaican Jerk Chickens - Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep47
programme.desc: No Age Like The Present / So Garfelt - Oh creates a boov-tech machine that makes Tip and Lucy the same age/When Tip is fired from Garbage, she gets a new job at Garfeldt's fish stand

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep47
programme.desc: Lucky and the Warm Welcome - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep48
programme.desc: Lucky and the Dressage Sabotage - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep43
programme.desc: They Might Be Sky Giants / The Grugest Story Ever Told - After getting hit on the head, Eep has a vision and sets out to get the Valley to show how thankful they are; Grug feels like he's the biggest joke in Ahhh Valley, so he asks Thunk to make a buy-o-pic of him to show people just how truly great he is

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.desc: Triple Cross - Hiccup teams with an unexpected person in search for an antidote when Toothless is seemingly poisoned

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Bedtime / Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg - The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out! // Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups Save the Glasses - Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Match Set - Bissy and Ginger are twins for a day! But when Ginger changes her mind, Bissy worries they'll no longer be friends.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Adventures of Randy Rock - Turtle doesn't know how to best enjoy time with the class pet rock.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Cham Cham Champion - Bossy Bear, an enthusiastic extrovert, and Turtle, a thoughtful introvert, are unlikely besties navigating silly childhood adventures in their Koreatown-inspired city of Pleasantburg.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Santiago's Greatest Treasure / The Golden Banana Treasure - When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Abuelo's Treasure - The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zo has invited all of Peppa and Georges friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
