programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep223
programme.desc: Bunny Hunt - A sea bunny ravages Squidward's garden, but SpongeBob thinks it's cute!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Mega Bounce Battle - The boys disobey Dave's orders to not play a dangerous game then have to hide their injuries when they get hurt.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Animal House Party / Dr. Zap vs Electroboy - When Derek overhears that Alvin and his brothers are alone for the weekend, he plans a wild party at their house. // Theodore is hit by lightning and believes he's like his comic book hero, until he's told he's actually a villain.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Mega Bounce Battle / Gossip Guy - The boys disobey Dave's orders to not play a dangerous game then have to hide their injuries when they get hurt. // The school newspaper has a sudden increase in sales when a gossip column appears poking fun at other students.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep186
programme.desc: Safe Deposit Krabs / Plankton's Pet - Mr. Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottoms brand-new bank, and its up to SpongeBob & Patrick to save him. // After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Nitwit Neighborhood News / The Patrick Show MidSeason Finale - Patrick and Squidina report the news around Bikini Bottom. // The Patrick Show presents the epic conclusion to the first half of its first season.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep188
programme.desc: Kenny the Cat / Yeti Krabs - SpongeBob will do anything to get to meet his newest hero, Kenny The Cat. // Attempting to get more work out of Squidward, Mr. Krabs spins the story of the monstrous Yeti Crab, which eats lazy workers.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Biorpsgiving - Captain Doug Quasar meets Pat-Tron's robot family.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep110
programme.desc: My Fair Nobby / Gimme a News Break - When Nobby becomes too civilized for Narlene, SpongeBob and Patrick help him remember his backwoods ways. // Perch and his pal Harvey report the news of Kamp Koral, but they stumble upon evidence of a ridiculous conspiracy!

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Camped! - When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. // They soon uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it and prove the existence of an old camp legend.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Diss the Cook / For Sale by Loner - Lincoln is convinced the middle school lunch lady is holding a grudge against him and his older sisters. // Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Fright Bite / The Loudly Bones - When a vampire moves into Royal Woods, Lucy must convince him to turn the Mortician's Club into vampires. // Lisa discovers that the dinosaur bones she found in her backyard may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Pasture Bedtime / Shop Girl - The boys struggle with whether to attend Liam's barn sleepover or Girl Jordan's awesome pool party. // The kids worry that Leni is too weak and try to teach her how to be more aggressive.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep118
programme.desc: A Space Affair to Remember - While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep152
programme.desc: Big Sister Sam - Patrick's big sister Samantha comes for a visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep115
programme.desc: Grandpappy the Pirate - Mr. Krabs' granddad is coming to town! But instead of being excited, Mr. Krabs is nervous because his swarthy pirate granddad thinks that Mr. Krabs is a pirate, too.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Neptune's Ball - The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Surf N' Turf - Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Kick Some Bot - Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Vacation Daze - When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: Patnocchio / ChefBob - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty. // When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep154
programme.desc: The Hot Shot - Tony Fast Jr., the son of a famous race car driver, tries to teach SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Qilin Time - Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy afterall.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep211
programme.desc: A Tigress Tale - When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace desides she needs a new Kung Fu Master, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Bitter Work - When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher. Meanwhile, Sokka gets himself in a jam.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313

programme.title: Nemesis - The Abbott Years Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - When Tony Abbott swept to power with a thumping victory over the Labor government in 2013 his future seemed assured. But in just under two years, he was removed as Prime Minister. So how did it all go so wrong so quickly?

programme.title: Planet America Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The race to the 2024 Presidential Election is on. The Republican field has been reduced to two candidates: frontrunner Donald Trump and Nikki Haley, while Joe Biden runs for re-election. Chas and John cover the week's events.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Turner's Beach Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Draftsman Nigel Eberhardt and partner Nina are conservationists at heart. They love the natural environment and have managed to secure one of the last remaining native bush blocks in Turners Beach to build their home.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Rowan Trees Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Meet a farmer and forest scientist who has spent 30 years researching, growing and harvesting a very important crop - trees.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: The World Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites - South Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - From flat whites, to avo on toast, Aussie baristas and cooks are sought after all over the world. So how did Australian brekky and brunch's make it big on the world stage?

programme.title: Back Roads - Timber Creek, NT Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Back Roads heads to Timber Creek in the Top End where guest presenter Kristy O'Brien finds an unlikely partnership is creating positive spin offs for the town and meets locals who've found love in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Planet America Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The race to the 2024 Presidential Election is on. The Republican field has been reduced to two candidates: frontrunner Donald Trump and Nikki Haley, while Joe Biden runs for re-election. Chas and John cover the week's events.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Herlyn Kaur brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Black Snow - The Lost Boys Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Cormack investigates the link between Ezekiel's missing cousins, the lost boys, and Isabel's murder.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Turner's Beach Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Draftsman Nigel Eberhardt and partner Nina are conservationists at heart. They love the natural environment and have managed to secure one of the last remaining native bush blocks in Turners Beach to build their home.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Costa Georgiadis discovers new life in a fire affected landscape, Jane Edmanson visits a garden celebrating perennial plants, Millie Ross plants flavour packed produce and Tino Carnevale explores a saffron farm.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Herlyn Kaur in Perth.

programme.title: The Business Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the morning's top stories. Michael Rowland and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Emma Rebellato and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Lorna Dunkley in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ruby Cornish brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep11

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz
programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon Rocky Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep501BryceMitchellGigaChikadzeHenriHooftCirylGane
programme.desc: Arkansas' Bryce Mitchell tells us what it means to be a home-grown fighter, Giga Chikadze breaks down his most lethal striking moves, Henri Hooft gives an insight into his career in the corner of the worlds best fighters, and we join Interim Heavyweight Champ Ciryl Gane on a media tour around his home city of Paris.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev
programme.desc: UFC 280 featured a battle for the vacant lightweight title between former champion Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Plus, Aljamain Sterling defended his bantamweight belt against TJ Dillashaw. See the whole main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hermansson vs. Pyfer
programme.desc: Prelims - Philadelphia finisher Joe Pyfer went viral with his knockout win on Dana Whites Contender Series, and after three more big wins in the Octagon, he will make his first main event appearance at the APEX in Las Vegas on February 11 against perennial middleweight contender Jack Hermansson. With Pyfer sporting a 92 percent finish rate and Hermansson ending 17 of his 23 wins before the final horn, the odds are strong that this UFC Fight Night headliner wont be going the distance, and that has fight fans eagerly anticipating this 185-pound showdown
